item.title: 【Helpdesk】kpop24hrs invite anyone ?
item.description:
Hello everyone!!
As I have been collecting K-pop content for years now and have come across private trackers like Jpopsuki, Kpop24hrs, Avitaz (and many more), I wanted to have an account on Kpop24hrs. Luckily, I already have accounts for Jpopsuki and Avitaz, so I am familiar with the rules of the entire ratio system and how a private tracker works. If you want an invite to Jpopsuki, which is, of course, hard to get, we can share an invite for an invite.
Hoping for a quick reply.
item.author: curious_chae
